positive_examples: This is an example of destroyer.
We observed destroyer in this context.
A typical case of destroyer would involve these features.
The concept of destroyer applies here.
A fast warship designed primarily for anti-submarine warfare and fleet escort duties.
negative_examples: This is an example of aircraft carrier, not destroyer.
This represents military ship in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AircraftCarrier, or other types of MilitaryShip

definition: A fast maneuverable warship designed to escort larger vessels.
